name: Food Waste
description:
A short application showing the issues of food waste in the UK, where it originates from, and how to solve it.

Controls: 

  • Movement – WASD or Arrow Keys 
  • Jump - Spacebar 
  • Look – Mouse 
  • Open Button – E 
  • Exit - Escape 

Required:

  • Decent Computer with good GPU
  • 170MB free storage space - Windows
  • 280MB free storage space - Mac
